Get the great-circle centroid for a given bounding box.

Source: R/get_bbox_centroid.R
get_bbox_centroid.Rd

Get the great-circle centroid for a given bounding box.

get_bbox_centroid(bbox)

Arguments

bbox

The bounding box to find a centroid for. If not already a terrainr_bounding_box object, will be converted.

Value

A terrainr_coordinate_pair.

See also

Other utilities: add_bbox_buffer(), calc_haversine_distance(), convert_distance(), deg_to_rad(), get_coord_bbox(), point_from_distance(), rad_to_deg()

Examples

get_bbox_centroid(
  list(
    c(lat = 44.04905, lng = -74.01188),
    c(lat = 44.17609, lng = -73.83493)
  )
)

#> An object of class "terrainr_coordinate_pair"
#> Slot "lat":
#>     lat 
#> 44.1126 
#> 
#> Slot "lng":
#>      lng 
#> -73.9235 
#>
